attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament  and Hold an Election Now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This parliament is plainly corrupt. It has too many members with low, or no moral judgement, who are completely out of touch with the electorate and is led by incompetents, who are not up to the job. It should therefore be dissolved with immediate effect, so a new one, with members who can justify the term honourable, can be elected.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
